summary: App de monitoramento/análise de mercado usando dados da Binance Futures, com ciclo de versões (v40 live) e plano de melhorias para próxima versão (v41), priorizando refino do Radar.
architectural_notes: O app consome dados ao vivo via Binance Futures (USD-M) endpoints públicos.
Plano menciona uso de chave de API Binance read-only para monitoramento de trades.

existing_features.title: Refine the Radar anomaly detection logic to detect abnormal moves earlier and reduce false positives by replacing the current fixed baselines and thresholds with adaptive, market-relative scoring.
Add smarter Radar filters in the Radar UI so users can narrow alerts by anomaly type(s) and severity, in addition to the existing trend and min-confidence filters.

Introduce a user-facing “Radar Sensitivity” setting that tunes detection thresholds (e.g., Conservative / Balanced / Aggressive) and apply it consistently to both the Radar list and the top-of-screen Dynamic Alerts notifications.

new_feature_requests.summary: Refinar o Radar para detectar movimentos anormais mais cedo e aplicar filtros mais inteligentes.

projectName: Refine Radar anomaly detection with smarter filters and earlier signals
